Posts.EditableText: Ok, So first i would like to ask please, No code because i have little to literally no experience in coding and now my problem...... So, i started writing my gamebook a couple days ago i had fun writing the story and the diffrent path the player could take and then..... I had just realized i really hate the idea of having a solid color backround, So i started  looking around for ways to Get a backroundimage but i found literally nothing so please.... if you can tell me how to give my gamebook a imagebackround i would be more grateful
